You need to be using HTTPS to place a sc: You need to be using HTTPS to place a screen-sharing call.
You can use the custom server options to: You can use the custom server options to sign into other servers by specifying a different homeserver URL. This allows you to use RPG Chat with an existing account on a different homeserver.
You can also set a custom identity serve: You can also set a custom identity server, but you won't be able to invite users by email address, or be invited by email address yourself.
